name: AI Defense (alpha)
description:
Hi,

I am 14 years old and i developed a Tower Defense game where you  have to destroy the enemy robots.

When you click on the play button you will see the GUI of the game and White boxes on the map

When you click on one of the boxes the Building menu will apear and you can buy your Towers to destroy the enemys

When you now click on the Tower you can turn it, upgrade it, or sell it
